name: WordPress dialog
author: ThemeEgg

sections.description:
This plugin help you to show dialog in any frontend pages via shortcode.

Some demo shortcode of this plugin

  • [teg_wp_dialog page_id=”5″]
  • [teg_wp_dialog post_id=”6″]

You can change shortcode attribute as per requirement, please visit our official page http://docs.themeegg.com/docs/teg-wp-dialog/ for more information.

Get free support at https://themeegg.com/support-forum/

Requirements

  • WordPress 4.5 or later.

Contribute

You can contribute to the source code in our GitHub page.

Features

  1. Show dialog on any pages or post via shortcode
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin and extract the files
  2. Upload “teg-wp-dialog” to your wp-
    content/plugins/directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Put shortcode to anywhere.
  5. Also you can change attribute of shortcode as you needed.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Download the plugin and extract the files
  2. Upload “teg-wp-dialog” to your wp-
    content/plugins/directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Put shortcode to anywhere.
  5. Also you can change attribute of shortcode as you needed.

How many argument accepts by this shortcode plugin?

Please visit our official WordPress dialog page(http://doc.themeegg.com/plugins/teg-wp-dialog) for more details. You can find there more details about this plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0.4 2017/11/14

  • fix – Tested version compatibility

1.0.3 2017/10/29

  • Shortcode support for post content

1.0.1

  • Multiple dialog templates feature added

1.0

  • Initial Release
